title: Integration - Wire up layers in index.ts
description:
- Create src/index.ts entry point
- Wire up domain, infrastructure, and presentation layers
- Implement error handling for:
  - API failures
  - Invalid configuration
  - Missing environment variables

title: Domain Layer - Types and calculations
description:
- Define vacation types (VacationType, VacationEntry, VacationSummary) in src/domain/vacation.ts
- Define configuration schema with zod in src/domain/config.ts
- Implement calculation functions:
  - WORK_DAY_HOURS = 7.5
  - Bank hours/days from CAD amount
  - Total available days
  - Remaining days after usage

title: Project Setup - Initialize pnpm and TypeScript
description:
- Initialize pnpm project
- Install dependencies with exact versions (zod 4.3.5, dotenv 17.2.3)
- Install dev dependencies (typescript 5.9.3, @tsconfig/node24 24.0.3, @tsconfig/strictest 2.0.8, @types/node 24.x)
- Configure TypeScript (extend @tsconfig/node24 and @tsconfig/strictest)
- Add pnpm scripts (build, start)

title: Infrastructure Layer - Clockify API client
description:
- Create HTTP client in src/infrastructure/clockify/client.ts
  - Base URL: https://api.clockify.me/api/v1
  - Reports URL: https://reports.api.clockify.me/v1
  - Auth via X-Api-Key header
- Define API response schemas with zod in src/infrastructure/clockify/types.ts
- Implement adapter in src/infrastructure/clockify/adapter.ts
- Handle pagination for detailed reports
- Required API calls:
  - GET /user (current user ID)
  - GET /workspaces/{workspaceId}/projects (find project IDs)
  - POST /workspaces/{workspaceId}/reports/detailed (time entries)

title: Presentation Layer - CLI output formatting
description:
- Parse CLI arguments (--year, default to current year) in src/presentation/cli.ts
- Load and validate configuration from .env
- Format monthly breakdown table with hours and days
- Format summary output showing remaining/total days
